titleStmt.title: In mortem serenissimæ principis Mariæ ad regem elegia
titleStmt.author: Vliet, Jan Joris van der, b. ca. 1610.

notesStmt.note: The Roman numeral date is made using turned C's.
Latin verse - "Hei mihi! quuis trepidas scralis nuncius aures,".
Reproduction of the originals in Chetham's Library (Early English books) and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
